name: Notion Cash Flow Overview
description: All finances clearly under control.Keep your finances under control. With the Notion template "Cash Flow Overview" you will have an overview of your expenses and income, currently every month.You will clearly see the balance of your accounts, the categories for which you spend, the amount of your monthly expenses and income, and detailed information about each movement. All on one side.Keeping your finances under control has never been easier.What's included:Balance on each accountCurrent overvi
features: Balance on each account; Current overview of Expenses categories; Monthly overview of expenses; Monthly overview of income; Simple entry of new expenses and income; Initial Setup Guide
